name: Puzzle Rings Demo
description:
Puzzle Rings is a medium paced game, where you try to find a single path to fill out all the spaces in the board.

This was made for the Mini Ludum Dare #55 in 2 days, although the game works, the demo proved that the game needed to be overhauled thematically in order for player to understand the rules intuitively.

The game is here in it's original state to preserve it for historical purposes. I have a rebuilt version in the works, for more information checkout http://snowdrama.net for project updates!

Installation

For Windows PC players: Download the PC version below and unRar it with a program like WinRAR or 7Zip into a folder. Then just double Click PuzzleRings.jar and the application should run.

For Android Players: Currently the only option is to download the APK file and move it to your device then install it by taping it from a file utility, like Astro File Manager. You will also need to allow apps from unknown sources in the security part of your settings.
